channel.title: Java Issues - I Can't Code
channel.description:
Hey Moparscape,
I've been having Compiling problems for like 6 Months now, I haven't really coded for that long so that's why I haven't posted anything. I'm going to start coding and stuff again and starting up a big project that is a remake of Runescape. I really need these problems fixed in order to start coding again. I'm going to post my problems underneath and add pictures and stuff so I can make the person's job that is helping me a lot easier.
[b]The user who helps me will get Rep++![/b]
I need this fixed ASAP.
My System OS: Windows 7 Ultimate 64-Bit.
Run Client: [code=java] @echo off Title Run Client cd ./Class/ START javaw -Xmx1500m Gui 30 0 highmem members 32 exit [/code]
Run Client Error: [code=java] [12/06/11 1:17 AM]: Launching Server! [12/06/11 1:17 AM]: Exception in thread "main" [12/06/11 1:17 AM]: java.net.Bind Exception: Address already in use: bind [12/06/11 1:17 AM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Native Method) [12/06/11 1:17 AM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketChannelImpl.bind(Unknown Sourc e) [12/06/11 1:17 AM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketAdaptor.bind(Unknown Source) [12/06/11 1:17 AM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.r egisterNew(SocketAcceptor.java:363) [12/06/11 1:17 AM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.a ccess$800(SocketAcceptor.java:55) [12/06/11 1:17 AM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor$W orker.run(SocketAcceptor.java:222) [12/06/11 1:17 AM]: at org.apache.mina.util.NamePreservingRunnable.run(NameP reservingRunnable.java:51) [12/06/11 1:17 AM]: at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Thanks,
SacredHeart.

item.title: Java Issues - I Can't Code
item.dc:creator: @SacredHeart SacredHeart
item.description:
@SacredHeart wrote:

That doesn’t work.

Also, Can you please read the 2 errors.

Read full topic

item.title: Java Issues - I Can't Code
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

try this:

@echo off
title Client
"C:/Program files (x86)/java/jre6/bin/java.exe" -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32
EXIT

don’t know what that cd class thingy is doing there o.0

Read full topic

item.title: Java Issues - I Can't Code
item.dc:creator: @SacredHeart SacredHeart
item.description:
@SacredHeart wrote:

Thank-you.

That works.

Also, I’ve got another run issue.

Look at the Client Run Error.

Read full topic

item.title: Java Issues - I Can't Code
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

try

@echo off
title Server Runner
"C:/Program files (x86)/java/jre6/bin/java.exe" -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server
pause

Read full topic

item.title: Java Issues - I Can't Code
item.dc:creator: @SacredHeart SacredHeart
item.description:
@SacredHeart wrote:

I’ve fixed the Compiler, But now.

The run is still stuffed up and is till saying.


‘java’ is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.
Press any key to continue . . .
[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Java Issues - I Can't Code
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

On windows 7 the Java Compiler isn’t located in the program files , try looking for a folder named jdk1.6_2*
then change the directory in the compiler batch to your new directory.

Edit , oh lol no wait , that’s only a probability ; it COULD be so that your jdk isn’t located at program files…
goto c: / program files / java
there should be a folder named jdk1.6_** , what are the last 2 digit of those folders?

OR you didn’t install JDK at all
in that ase , visit http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/index.html the 1st box is the jdk which you have to download to start coding with java.

Read full topic

item.title: Java Issues - I Can't Code
item.dc:creator: @ravens ravens
item.description:
@ravens wrote:

i think you should search “rsps 64 bit” or something
goodluck

Read full topic

item.title: Java Issues - I Can't Code
item.dc:creator: @SacredHeart SacredHeart
item.description:
@SacredHeart wrote:

Hey Moparscape,

I’ve been having Compiling problems for like 6 Months now, I haven’t really coded for that long so that’s why I haven’t posted anything. I’m going to start coding and stuff again and starting up a big project that is a remake of Runescape. I really need these problems fixed in order to start coding again. I’m going to post my problems underneath and add pictures and stuff so I can make the person’s job that is helping me a lot easier.

The user who helps me will get Rep++!

I need this fixed ASAP.

My System OS: Windows 7 Ultimate 64-Bit.

Run Client:

@echo off
Title Run Client
cd ./Class/
START javaw  -Xmx1500m Gui 30 0 highmem members 32
exit

Run Client Error:

[12/06/11 1:17 AM]: Launching Server! [12/06/11 1:17 AM]: Exception in thread "main" [12/06/11 1:17 AM]: java.net.Bind Exception: Address already in use: bind [12/06/11 1:17 AM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Native Method) [12/06/11 1:17 AM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketChannelImpl.bind(Unknown Sourc e) [12/06/11 1:17 AM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketAdaptor.bind(Unknown Source) [12/06/11 1:17 AM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.r egisterNew(SocketAcceptor.java:363) [12/06/11 1:17 AM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.a ccess$800(SocketAcceptor.java:55) [12/06/11 1:17 AM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor$W orker.run(SocketAcceptor.java:222) [12/06/11 1:17 AM]: at org.apache.mina.util.NamePreservingRunnable.run(NameP reservingRunnable.java:51) [12/06/11 1:17 AM]: at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Press any key to continue . . .

Thanks,

SacredHeart.

Read full topic
